Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Barack Obama cancelled a day of commemoration for fallen police officers, when in fact it was never cancelled or curtailed by President Obama.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on fabricated information and quotes that were never said by Donald Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Donald Trump reinstated a day of commemoration for fallen police officers, when in fact there was no need for reinstatement as it was never cancelled.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim was made by hyperpartisan websites to create a false narrative and criticize Barack Obama.
